title: Shyvana w vfx missing
body: Played a shyvana jungle game yesterday and the vfx for burnout would turn on and off. I think it would show when the damage ticked then disappear between ticks. Only played the one game so unsure how to repro =/.

replies.body:
Hey Myolin,

Were you using the base Shyvana, or were you using a skin?
I believe i have noticed this before as well.. but i wrote it off as imagination.. and dark flame shyvana, is she supposed to have a very defined line around her w? it looks.. odd

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=QA5ZUo2w,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-10T22:02:10.987+0000)
>
> Hey Myolin,
> 
> Were you using the base Shyvana, or were you using a skin?

I can confirm this happens with base shyvana, I was so confused with the new W VFX because it would just turn on and off and only visually exist when it does a damage proc
